extendedInfo.description: You can now use Driveline to predict your car MPG for your next journey before you even depart! Select your vehicle from our database and search for a route between any two places. Driveline calculates a personalised MPG for you based on your selected vehicle, the ratio of city and highway driving on your route and how fast you plan to drive on the highway. In addition to this, Driveline also calculates CO2 emissions, journey duration and fuel expenses.Use Driveline however you like - use its functionality to make an informed decision of how to drive your next journey, or use its versatility to accurately calculate your fuel economy!.Drivelines vehicle database contains all cars that have been available for purchase in the USA since 2010. Vehicle manufacturers include; Acura, Audi, Bentley, BMW, Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Dodge Fiat, Fisker, Ford, GMC, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Lexus, Lincoln, Magnum, Maserati, Mazda, Mercedes, Mercury, Mini, Mitsibushi, Nissan, Pontiac, Porsche, Ram, Roush, Saab, Saturn, Scion, Spyker, Subaru, Suzuku, Toyota, Volkswagen and Volvo.

reviews.title: Small car selection
reviews.comment: Only 2010 and newer vehicles. Don\'t have all engine and transmission options for the vehicles they do list either.
reviews.author: Logan Willmert

reviews.title: Changed the way I drive
reviews.comment: Well designed app that shows time, cost and CO2 differences within routes and driving style. Also found myself comparing cars to find which one was more economical!
reviews.author: Catherine Ewins

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Location detection or access to location history would be great. Also incorrectly predicts city driving for trips that should be on the highway.
reviews.author: Jordan Samaniego

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Just what I need, easy to use and accurate just need to add a few more cars
reviews.author: Timothy Snell

reviews.title: Exceptionally useful!
reviews.comment: Really well designed and useful app. Please add Opel cars.
reviews.author: Ivaylo Stoyanov

reviews.title: Awesome, beautiful and Useful
reviews.comment: You basically use it to figure out how long/much money a drive will cost.  I\'ve only used it once and it worked well.
reviews.author: Ben Jones

reviews.title: Could Not Calculate Route
reviews.comment: First of all, it only lists with 2010 and newer cars. But more importantly, it doesn\'t actually work. Put in start and end addresses and it says, \"Could Not Calculate Route.\" I\'ll stick with \"aCar.\"  It\'s a really good car expense tracker that actually works.
reviews.author: Steven Woodruff

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Been looking for something like this for ages
reviews.author: John Cavendish
